author: Chloe Kang
text: This AF is just too small. During the golden hours around 7 to 8 pm, it gets way too crowded. It really difficult to work out. Plus, they run classes at the same time, so there‚Äôs barely any space left for free weights. Honestly, why should I have to worry about the class schedule while I‚Äôm trying to work out? I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll be renewing my membership after it ends.

author: Peter Mokosch
text: This gym I used, when on vacation in Singapore. The gym has open 24 hours and has all you need to do your running and weights. The only not so nice thing are the showers, however still get 4 points from me.

author: Woo Chiao Tay
text: This is a nice quiet, two level gym. The staff always friendly, greeting me warmly, and enter the door. Have a good self equipment and it‚Äôs usually not crowded so you don‚Äôt have to wait for equipment.

author: Gary Ang
text: I honestly quite like the place, 30 seconds walk from the carpark, so far none other gym can beat this record! Usually go there in the morning and hence no staff is around. Equipment wise is quite good, 1st floor weights and dumbbell, second floor machines and functional space. Machine brand is from Mprecor. Love the down light btw!

author: Max
text: This gym is simply the best. Two racks for squats/bench/deadlift so you always have one available. I prefer to come early in the day, so gym being 24/7 is amazing. Upstairs there is an area to do non-weight exercises and then take a shower (also very nice). The staff and management are friendly and professionaly resolved all my inquiries. The price was also x2.5 less than the gym around the corner. Really couldn‚Äôt ask for more, can‚Äòt recommend you guys enough.

author: WanderWithWit
text: This is a rare gem located in Balestier and is also one of the best managed AF gym I have visited so farüòÜ. Thanks to Balestier AF team. Thumbs up!! ‚Ä¶

author: SAM
text: Alif, thank you so much for your amazing customer service!

author: Maria Chia
text: This is a Really a Friendly place, though I'm not a member and not there to exercise (the lazy type)... but my very brief experience there last evening really gave me the feeling that ~ the staff and trainers there are extremely helpful, polite and understanding... .all the best to all of you, and thanks so much for rendering me the help.

author: Parvathi k
text: Been a member for 2 years and notice that the current club manager don't take members feedback seriously. The cleanliness of the equipment, bathroom is very bad. And they only have 2 tv channels to watch, Gym wipes  take 1 month for them to refill it.  and I have to carry my own wet wipes every time I go for workout. Overall membership was not value for money and would not recommend to anyone.

author: Oliver Jack
text: This branch of Anytime Fitness leaves a lot to be desired compared to its counterparts elsewhere in SG. It is not on the same level of cleanliness, with quite a bit of dirt, both on the equipment and throughout the facilities (that upstairs window is terrible). The air conditioning is far too warm ‚Äî this gym is easily 3-4 degrees warmer than any other location in Singapore ‚Äî that doesn‚Äôt sound like a lot until you‚Äôre on the treadmill, drenched in sweat. Finally, the equipment is old and in need of some upgrades (the benches in the weight room are nasty and falling apart, for example). These aren‚Äôt to the standards of the other Anytime Fitness locations, throughout the globe or on the island.

author: Beatrix Yap
text: My go to place whenever I'm in need of a workout! Clean and spacious, well-equipped and on top of that they provide free classes from Monday to Saturday for all members :) The trainers that they have there are also experienced and friendly too, they're willing to help whenever you have any questions with regards to your fitness goals or diet. Kudos to the team at AF Balestier!

author: K Daron
text:
Overall a good gym

It consists of two levels, first floor has the free weights and cables. Second floor has mostly machines and cardio equipment.

It has all the basic equipments and weights. They have two power racks but no deadlift platform.

Barbells and weight plates are Hampton brand which are likely to be 46lbs which is about 20.86kg slightly heavier and thicker than the usual olympic barbell. The weight plates are also suspected to be in lbs so do take note.

The only downside is that there isnt any additional gym floormats for block deadlifts or to cushion the weights to reduce noise when deadlifting beyond 180kg

They have taken the feedback of adding a traditional cable lat pulldown which is fantastic.

Lighting used to be great many years ago but it has been deteriorating and as such, not as bright as before making the gym look dull and moody.

Overall a good homely gym, staffs are friendly and always willing to help out.

author: Gus Meyer-Jones
text:
I came to the Balestier anytime for a month while in temporary accommodation at Novena. I was having a bad day the first time I came and want overly excited by the place but I persisted. Gotta keep them gains right? Soon I settled into a nice routine and have ended up loving this place. What are the good things? Plenty of available free weights. It's probably covid related but I never have to queue for equipment. Plenty of variety of free and cable machines. Even a 45degree leg press! Upstairs has a good variety of cable and cardio machines and a big stretching area. It's never too cold in the gym either. What's the point of working out if you don't sweat?
Only negative is the couple of dude sitting playing on their phones playing with their hair, taking selfies and pouting. I might be that guy that deliberately bombs their pics for the sheer hell of it. Sad to be leaving.

author: Thomas Chan
text: Its those typical AF gym that I've been. I will be bias because this is my home gym. Weights is at lower level and upper is machines like treadmaill, leg press,, pull down etc. I don't think its the biggest I've been but its enough for your own workout. Its typically busy After 7pm to 8pm on weekdays. If you want a quieter environment, come on sunday morning or late evening. But during this pandemic, its only open during staff time, so no more in the middle of the night workout.

author: vasanth kumar
text: Overall it's good. Not crowded, Very spacious of two floors and with good number of equipments than few other branches. They run 24 hours every day even during Covid days. Have vending machines and protein bars.

author: Jamster
text: Great place with decent equipment. I suggest maybe a cable machine equipped with rows to make the gym more complete. Extremely low crowd in the morning, perfect for pre-work gym session

author: Eugene Sadovski
text: Great gym, new equipment

author: Edgar Lee
text: Staff are extremely friendly and helpful. They never fail to greet you when you enter or leave. Overall great environment to workout in. üòä ‚Ä¶

author: michelle chen
text: Not bad, double storey, some components look a little old. A little lacking empty space for yoga mats. Air circulation could be improved? A little cramped overall

author: Tan Gui Hong
text: Nice place nice team.

author: bryan valdellon
text: Clean. All machines have dedicated cleaning kit. Many hand sanitizers in place. Staff are very nice. Clean bathroom.

author: Jacque B
text: Love this Anytime Fitness! Perfect set up of machines!! Every time I go to the area it is my go-to gym. üòä ‚Ä¶

author: Foodiejerm
text: A good range of machines and weights, with good service from the staff.

author: Jeffyu 82
text: Take feedback poorly. They forget the fact they are running a gym‚Ä¶One of my best decision to terminate my 3-4 years membership with them.

author: Don Adzhar
text: 2 levels of fitness equipment and has abit more machines but toilet is not enough

author: J C
text: Not bad at all. A bit small for the busy times, but it has everything you need. Just bring a towel.

author: Ameerul Basheer
text: Great supportive and friendly staff. Decent sized gym.

author: Freddie Ho
text: Been with them almost 9 yrs yet can say that pioneer customer before open

author: Felix Agung Wijono
text: Great place to workout, staff very friendly, can always talk to the PT and manager shenevee

author: Akash Srivastava
text: Good gym, has free members classes here almost everyday.

author: Natalie CL Tan
text: Great place! Clean and Neat! Love the classes!

author: Chen Yaosen
text: Great Gym with Boxing Bag

author: Globe Trekka
text: Staff very friendly; equipment well maintained

author: Kym Teng
text: Amazing & friendly staff,great facilities. unbelievably outstanding !!

author: Mac Mac
text: Well equipped and friendly staff

text: Fully equipped and lots of classes to choose from.

text: Great place to work out.

text: The gym is very good

author: ÿßÿ≠ŸÖÿØ ŸÖÿ≠ŸÖÿØ
text: The price is exaggerated and there is no weekly subscription

author: A Rastogi (Privacy Inspector)
text: Thank you for your kind rating of our club :) We hope that you had enjoyed your workout with us!

author: Mayur Dube
text: Thanks Mayur for your kind rating. We hope to be able to meet your expectations and improve to be able to get that 5 star rating from you!! :)

author: David Tan
text: Thank you David for rating our club, 4 out of 5 stars :) We hope you had enjoyed your session here and look to improve to get a 5/5 rating the next time!

author: Nazrul Haique
text: Hi Nazrul, thank you for taking the time to rate our club. Should you have any feedback for us, do let us know! We hope you had a good session at our club, and look to improve further! :)

author: Lim Zhong Jie
text: Thank you Zhong Jie for taking the time to review our club! Appreciate your feedback and hopefully you'll continue enjoying the club! :)
